content:
You're considering expanding your graphic tee collection, and that's a great idea! Since you liked the ones you got on sale, you might want to explore different designs to add some variety to your wardrobe. Here are some pros and cons of sticking to the same style versus trying out new designs:

**Sticking to the same style:**

Pros:

* You know you like the fit and quality of the tees.
* You can create a consistent look by sticking to a similar style.
* You might be able to mix and match with your existing wardrobe pieces.

Cons:

* Your wardrobe might start to look repetitive.
* You might miss out on exploring new styles and trends.

**Trying out different designs:**

Pros:

* You can add some variety to your wardrobe and create new outfits.
* You can experiment with different styles, themes, and trends.
* You might discover a new favorite design or style.

Cons:

* You might not like the fit or quality of the new tees.
* You might end up with tees that don't go well with your existing wardrobe.

Here's a suggestion:

* Try to find a balance between sticking to what you know and love, and exploring new designs. You could get a few more tees in a similar style to what you already have, and then try out one or two new designs to mix things up.
* Consider your personal style and what you feel comfortable wearing. If you're not sure about a particular design, you can always try it on in-store or read reviews from other customers.
* Don't be afraid to step out of your comfort zone and try something new. You might be surprised at how much you like a design that's different from what you normally wear!

Remember, graphic tees are a great way to express your personality and add some fun to your outfits. Have fun exploring different designs, and happy shopping at H&M!
